word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重通过直觉或理性感觉意识到某物的存在。 awkward, clumsy
指内心的感觉，强调深刻的心理活动。
侧重缺乏优雅、机敏和技巧。用于物时，指使用不便。
强调通过耳闻目睹或感觉而得到的信息，也指敏税的观察和推断。侧重感知，多与of一起用。
指人时，侧重行动笨拙；指物时，侧重制作粗陋或体积、重量过大而呈现笨重。

bilingual.source: She was fully conscious during the entire operation.
bilingual.target: 她在整个手术过程中都是有意识的。
他的生活活动是有意识的。
感恩是一种有意识的决定。
坦陀罗: 有意识的爱的艺术.

bilingual.source: He is very conscious of team discipline.
bilingual.target: 他很有意识的团队纪律。

bilingual.source: Was like the conscious being of the book.
bilingual.target: 就像那书册中有意识的生命.

bilingual.source: Not in the conscious sense—which you mean.
bilingual.target: 并非是有意识的――如你所指的。

bilingual.source: We refer to it as the Art of Conscious Loving.
bilingual.target: 我们作为有意识的爱的艺术来提及它。

bilingual.source: The foundation for all doing is conscious being.
bilingual.target: 所有行动的基础是有意识的存在。
海马体帮助我们形成有意识的记忆。

list.abstract: Conscious，英文单词，形容词，译为“意识到的；故意的；神志清醒的”。

yingyinNormal.en: Your memories are woven into your identity. If I should unlock them now when you're conscious...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的记忆与你的身份交织而成，如果我在你清醒的时候解锁...

yingyinNormal.en: No, she's right. As long as I've known you, you've always been self-conscious about your cleavage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，她说得对。自打我认识你以来，你一直都很在意自己的乳沟。

yingyinNormal.en: I failed you, Dolores. I'm so sorry. Robert doesn't see what I see in you, doesn't believe you're conscious.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我让你失望了，德洛丽丝，我很抱歉，罗伯特看不到我在你身上发现的潜能，他不相信你有意识。

yingyinNormal.en: As we are in fashionably health conscious cooking mode, I'm going to use a low sodium variety of light soy sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要制作时髦的健康饮食，我要用这种低钠的生抽酱油。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Bernard? Just don't forget, the hosts are not real. They're not conscious. You mustn't make Arnold's mistake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伯纳德，别忘了接待员不是真的，他们没有意识，你千万不能重蹈阿诺德的覆辙。

yingyinNormal.en: Intuitions are not to be ignored, John. They represent data processed too fast for the conscious mind to comprehend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不能忽视直觉，约翰，那是处理过快，超出人脑理解能力的数据。

yingyinNormal.en: So now in the first layer of the dream, I can impersonate Browning. And suggest concepts to Fischer's conscious mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此梦空间第一层 我会伪装成彼得，对费舍尔的意识稍作暗示。

yingyinNormal.en: Why won't you let me massage you? Well, it's, I mean I'd just, I'd be self-conscious. I mean you're my friend. I'd be naked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么不让我帮你按摩？我会无法放松，你是我的朋友，我得脱光衣服。

yingyinNormal.en: Your deepest seated needs and fears reside in areas of your brain that control your emotions and are not accessible to your higher-level conscious awareness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你最深的需要和恐惧就在你大脑中控制情感的部分，你的高等级自我意识是触及不到这部分的。

yingyinNormal.en: One, that in this place, the last thing you want the hosts to be is conscious; and two, the other group who considered their thoughts to be the voices of the gods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一、在这个地方我们最不想看到的就是接待员有自我意识；第二、另外一个群体认为他们的想法就是众神之声。

yingyinNormal.en: Either you are in each other's confidence and you have secret affairs to discuss, or you are conscious that your figures appear to the greatest advantage by walking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两是心腹之交，肯定有些私事要聊聊；否则就是你们自以为散起步来体态显得特别好看，所以要散散步。

yingyinNormal.en: For someone like you to steal? Yes. In the dream state, your conscious defenses are lowered and that makes your thoughts vulnerable to theft. It's called extraction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 便于你们偷取？对 睡梦状态意识防卫会减弱，便于我们从中盗取信息，我们就是盗梦者。

yingyinNormal.en: The other day she said she was self-conscious about the beauty mark on her shoulder, and I said, "You know, you can call that a beauty mark all you want. When there's hair growing out of it, that's a mole."
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一天她说觉得难为情因为肩膀上有颗美人印，而我说，“随你美化你那个美人印但当它上面长了根毛，那它就是个痣。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 知觉；清醒；意识；观念；感觉

word_family.mean: adj. 清醒的；感到的；意识到的；敏感的；知道的；察觉的；了解的；不自然的；关心…的；对… 感兴趣的

examination_example.sentence: This forces users to be more <highlight>conscious</highlight> of their role in passing along information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这迫使用户更加意识到他们在传递信息中的角色。

examination_example.sentence: It's not explicitly <highlight>conscious</highlight>; it's the idea that I'm a coach, and you're my team, and we're in this together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它没有明确的意识；这是一种想法，我是教练，你是我的团队，我们在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Another urge is so intrinsic that we are barely ever <highlight>conscious</highlight> of its abiding claims on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种冲动是如此内在，以至于我们几乎没有意识到它对我们的持久要求。

sense_info_list.zh: 特别感兴趣的; 关注的

examination_example.sentence: Millennials face the paradox of being the least formal generation yet the most <highlight>conscious</highlight> of style and personal branding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 千禧一代面临着这样一个悖论:他们是最不正式的一代，却最注重时尚和个人品牌。

examination_example.sentence: Several fast-fashion companies have made efforts to curb their impact on labor and the environment — including H&M, with its green <highlight>Conscious</highlight> Collection line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几家快时尚公司已经努力控制它们对劳动力和环境的影响——包括H&M的绿色环保系列时装线。

examination_example.sentence: These labels encourage style-<highlight>conscious</highlight> consumers to see clothes as disposable and to renew their wardrobe every few weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些标签鼓励注重风格的消费者将衣服视为一次性的，并每隔几周更新一次衣柜。

sense_info_list.en: having mental faculties not dulled by sleep, faintness, or stupor
sense_info_list.zh: 神志清醒的; 有意识的

examination_example.sentence: Another set of participants had to count backward from 1,000 by nines, occupying their <highlight>conscious</highlight> working memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一组参与者必须从1000开始倒数到9，这占据了他们有意识的工作记忆。

sense_info_list.en: (of an action or feeling) deliberate and intentional

examination_example.sentence: Visual recognition, reads the study, is "an automatic psychological process, occurring rapidly and intuitively with little or no apparent <highlight>conscious</highlight> deliberation".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究表明，视觉识别是“一种自发的心理过程，快速而直观地发生，几乎没有或根本没有明显的刻意思考”。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"…的"

word_usage.usage: conscious作形容词，表示“意识到；注意到”时，不用于名词之前，通常用于系动词之后，其后常接介词of或者that引导的从句，如：She's very conscious of the problems involved. 她非常清楚所涉及的问题。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示“有意识的”、“自觉的”，不指耳闻目睹，只强调心理意识的感觉。
强调通过耳闻目睹而认识到或意识到外界存在某事物，是感知的结果，通常用作表语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
